instruction.value: Inject rapidly into the antecubital vien.
Administer over 5 minutes, repeat every 2 hours as required.

AdditionalNotes.value: Ophthalmic Fluorescence Imaging. 500 mg = 5 mL of 10% injection solution. NOT FOR INTRATHECAL USE.
Scanning or Imaging with vascular flow in detached digits/flaps.NOT FOR INTRATHECAL USE.
Monitor arterial insufficiency in revascularized digits. NOT FOR INTRATHECAL USE.
